info.name: Meetings Management API
info.description: API endpoints for managing development teams and their meetings

request.description: Retrieves all development teams in the company
Retrieves all meetings for a specific development team by team ID

body.raw:
{
    "development_team_id": 1,
    "start_datetime": "2025-11-15T10:00:00Z",
    "end_datetime": "2025-11-15T11:00:00Z",
    "description": "Weekly sprint planning meeting to discuss upcoming tasks",
    "room": "Large Board Room"
}

request.description: Creates a new meeting for a development team

body.raw:
{
    "development_team_id": 2,
    "start_datetime": "2025-11-16T14:00:00Z",
    "end_datetime": "2025-11-16T15:30:00Z",
    "description": "Mobile app architecture review and performance optimization",
    "room": "Blue Room"
}

request.description: Example: Create a meeting for Team Mobile

item.name: Test Overlap - Exact Same Time (Should Fail)

body.raw:
{
    "development_team_id": 1,
    "start_datetime": "2025-11-05T09:00:00Z",
    "end_datetime": "2025-11-05T10:00:00Z",
    "description": "This meeting overlaps exactly with existing meeting",
    "room": "Test Room"
}

request.description: Tests overlap validation - tries to create meeting at exact same time as existing meeting for Team UI (should return 409 Conflict)

item.name: Test Overlap - Starts During Existing (Should Fail)

body.raw:
{
    "development_team_id": 1,
    "start_datetime": "2025-11-05T09:30:00Z",
    "end_datetime": "2025-11-05T11:00:00Z",
    "description": "This meeting starts during an existing meeting",
    "room": "Test Room"
}

request.description: Tests overlap validation - meeting starts during existing meeting (should return 409 Conflict)

item.name: Test Overlap - Ends During Existing (Should Fail)

body.raw:
{
    "development_team_id": 1,
    "start_datetime": "2025-11-05T08:00:00Z",
    "end_datetime": "2025-11-05T09:30:00Z",
    "description": "This meeting ends during an existing meeting",
    "room": "Test Room"
}

request.description: Tests overlap validation - meeting ends during existing meeting (should return 409 Conflict)

body.raw:
{
    "development_team_id": 1,
    "start_datetime": "2025-11-05T08:00:00Z",
    "end_datetime": "2025-11-05T11:00:00Z",
    "description": "This meeting completely contains an existing meeting",
    "room": "Test Room"
}

request.description: Tests overlap validation - meeting completely contains existing meeting (should return 409 Conflict)

item.name: Test No Overlap - Before Existing (Should Succeed)

body.raw:
{
    "development_team_id": 1,
    "start_datetime": "2025-11-05T07:00:00Z",
    "end_datetime": "2025-11-05T08:00:00Z",
    "description": "This meeting is before any existing meetings",
    "room": "Test Room"
}

request.description: Tests no overlap - meeting is completely before existing meeting (should succeed with 201)

item.name: Test No Overlap - After Existing (Should Succeed)

body.raw:
{
    "development_team_id": 1,
    "start_datetime": "2025-11-05T16:00:00Z",
    "end_datetime": "2025-11-05T17:00:00Z",
    "description": "This meeting is after all existing meetings",
    "room": "Test Room"
}

request.description: Tests no overlap - meeting is completely after existing meetings (should succeed with 201)
